Description: TCP/IP SystemVerilog SHUNT An example of primitive functions -Target(Client)

This example demonstrates the low-level primitive functions for establishing socket connections and transferring basic data types between SystemVerilog environments. It implements the client (target) side of a loopback test for integers, doubles, and byte data.
